quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be One.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Stop drifting…Sprint to the finish. Write off your hopes, and if your well-being matters to you, be your own savior while you can.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Hang on to your youthful enthusiasms — you’ll be able to use them better when you’re older.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Whatever can happen at any time can happen today.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: They lose the day in expectation of the night, and the night in fear of the dawn.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
